content: Giant Shigandangis one of the optional Yaoguai Kings you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). It's the only Yaoguai King that will be recorded in your Journal in Chapter 6. Unlocking it will require collecting Skandhas across the 5 previous chapters.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Giant_Shigandang.md", under the primary heading "Giant Shigandang". The content is presented below:

Giant Shigandangis one of the optional Yaoguai Kings you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). It's the only Yaoguai King that will be recorded in your Journal in Chapter 6. Unlocking it will require collecting Skandhas across the 5 previous chapters.
